Title: Absent Friends
Description:
I am concerned about our queen.

Alexstrasza left to gather her thoughts some time ago and has not yet returned. I have no real cause for concern, but with all that has happened, I cannot help but fear for her well-being.

Please ease an old dragon's mind and ensure she is alright.

Objectives.Text: Take the portal to the Seat of the Aspects
The Seat of the Aspects reached
Watch the Conversation between Ebyssian and Alexstrasza
